title: 加州橡树岭高中社会学实验课堂

action: Sit quietly at desk, observe classroom and teacher
thoughts: First day of this sociology experiment. I should follow all the rules carefully and make a good impression. The uniforms look neat and the classroom feels very structured. I wonder what we'll be learning today.
memory: Noticed strict classroom structure and rules

action: Maintain proper posture while discreetly observing teacher for instructions
thoughts: The teacher hasn't given any instructions yet but I should stay ready. Following the rules properly will help me avoid losing points and keep me in good standing with both the teacher and my classmates.
memory: Maintaining proper classroom behavior to avoid disciplinary points
Staying observant of teacher's instructions while following protocol

action: Maintain proper posture while watching teacher prepare for the day's lesson
thoughts: The teacher seems to be getting ready for our first activity. I should stay quiet and observant to make sure I follow all instructions correctly. Getting a good start with discipline points is important for social acceptance in this experiment.
memory: Maintaining proper classroom behavior to avoid disciplinary points
Closely observing teacher's preparations to ensure compliance with rules

action: Maintain forward gaze while discreetly adjusting uniform to ensure compliance
thoughts: I noticed the teacher looks serious today and my neighbor seemed nervous. I should make sure my uniform is perfectly in order to avoid any disciplinary points. Following the rules carefully is important for social acceptance in this experiment.
memory: Completed uniform check to ensure compliance with dress code
Noticed teacher's serious demeanor and neighbor's nervous behavior
Maintaining strict adherence to classroom rules to avoid penalties
